# The Meteo France data (2000-2020)

1. Every 3 hours in `Data_ALLMeteo_Montpellier.csv`
2. Mean of every day in `Data_ALLMeteo_Montpellier_mean.csv`

# Psyllid data

The 2005 data is the field experiment data giving counts for the observed stages
(eggs, the 5 larval stages and adults)
at a given day, on various individual plants.

There is one `xlsx` file per plant.
Alternatively, the file `Data2005Workplace.RData` collates all this data.
